name: Super Hero Cape
description:
CUSTOM super hero cape!

*pick your material- slick black, red or light pink. I can also find patterned fabric to match your hero in training's special interests or favorite colors!

*your shape- shield, diamond, circle or square

*your emblem- initial, star, lightning bolt... if you have something different in mind I'd love to make it happen! I even did T-Rex emblem once! [might need to adjust price according to intricacy and time required. That T-Rex was a little time consuming yo!]

*once you order I'll email you a form to fill out with all the info. And if you're not sure about the specifics email me & we'll create something that'll be awesome!

capes are made to order, please allow 2 weeks for delivery.

ships for FREE for the rest of August!

name: Arkansas Razorback
description:
crocheted Arkansas Razorback hat. all parts of the face handsewn on. the "curly tail" is my favorite part! 

100% soft acrylic. Machine washable & dryable. 

bigger sizes available. contact me at created411@yahoo.com.

made to order. please allow 7-10 days for delivery.

name: Beary Adorable!
description:
aw! I know, I know!! now you just need to pick a color! on the second picture you'll see the colors of yarn i have available. of course if you'd like something different, or are looking for a specific color just shoot me an email & i'll fix you right up!! no extra charge or anything! [created411@yahoo.com] Bigger sizes are available for a slight price adjustment.

50% wool & 50% acrylic so it's warm and soft enough for baby, yet easy enough to clean. Machine washable & dryable.

ships for FREE for the rest of August!

Shout out to Elizabeth from e-tells-tales.com for letting me use the picture of her darling Everett!
